REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ace fighter pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] graduated from the Star Academy with honors and distinguished [PAWN_objective]self as an ace fighter pilot in three campaigns against more advanced aggressor cultures. However, after one vicious battle, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_objective]self stranded and [PAWN_possessive] carrier ship destroyed. With nowhere to go, [PAWN_pronoun] entered [PAWN_possessive] escape pod and prayed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Acolyte of stars
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ever the dreamer, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across the universe to find the thing [PAWN_pronoun] felt was calling to [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aerospace engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an engineer responsible for the production of aircraft and spaceships. [PAWN_pronoun] focused on improving production lines, and was known for [PAWN_possessive] mastery of technical and research issues.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AI researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a renowned researcher in artificial intelligence, robotics, and interactive holography. [PAWN_possessive] friendships with the artificial minds [PAWN_pronoun] created gave [PAWN_objective] the confidence to interact with real people, and [PAWN_pronoun] soon excelled at personal communication.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Alcoholic trucker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a space trucker working for Arcknight Industries when [PAWN_pronoun] killed [PAWN_possessive] spouse and child in a crash. [PAWN_possessive] body was repaired with an experimental nano-genetic therapy. Now [PAWN_possessive] muscles continually regenerate and harden, and every movement tears the tissue anew. [PAWN_pronoun] bears the pain in silence.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Army cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined the army as a worker and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] time cooking and repairing. While [PAWN_pronoun] was stationed on a dangerous planet, [PAWN_pronoun] underwent basic shooting and survival training.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Art student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of practice, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to enroll into an art university and take [PAWN_possessive] skills further. [PAWN_pronoun] sought art industry work after graduating with good grades. [PAWN_pronoun] made some progress with private commissions, managing to make a decent living from [PAWN_possessive] art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was specially trained as an operative to be used for high-risk assassinations. [PAWN_possessive] skill with a rifle was unrivalled. [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually betrayed by [PAWN_possessive] superiors when a target found out about the hit and offered to fund their future projects. [PAWN_nameDef] swore to never trust anyone again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: AWOL soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an infantryman. When [PAWN_pronoun] was informed of [PAWN_possessive] assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, [PAWN_pronoun] decided [PAWN_pronoun] did not want to be a soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to escape via military spacejet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Banished soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became the most physically intimidating of the slaves, spending [PAWN_possessive] little free time obsessively sculpting [PAWN_possessive] body. [PAWN_possessive] efforts eventually paid off when the lord offered [PAWN_objective] a job as a personal bodyguard. Later, when [PAWN_pronoun] plotted to use [PAWN_possessive] position to kill the lord and free the slaves, [PAWN_pronoun] was discovered and barely escaped with [PAWN_possessive] life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Battle mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system. [PAWN_pronoun] was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized [PAWN_possessive] own equipment with original modifications.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Battlefield tech
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had received firearms training, but [PAWN_possessive] work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged [PAWN_objective] from service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Beast slayer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. [PAWN_pronoun] would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about [PAWN_possessive] prey before striking. [PAWN_pronoun] most enjoyed hunting thrumbos. Preferring to work alone, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bloodgame survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows. [PAWN_possessive] manipulative nature made [PAWN_objective] quite a nightmare, even to the audience. [PAWN_pronoun] was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a self-employed bounty hunter. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bounty hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brigand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] flew with a band of brigands [PAWN_pronoun] called friends. [PAWN_pronoun] even had a ship of [PAWN_possessive] own - The Dung Mucker 2000.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a nomadic trading caravan. It was [PAWN_possessive] duty to negotiate trade deals and ensure the safety of [PAWN_possessive] caravan from brigands and highwaymen. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master at managing wares, plotting routes, and striking good deals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravaneer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a caravan. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for the safety of [PAWN_possessive] caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cargo pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought up by cargo hands on a long-haul ore transport ship. [PAWN_pronoun] perfected [PAWN_possessive] skills at trading and manipulation of people while running weapons between systems.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Castaway
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When [PAWN_possessive] ship was destroyed, [PAWN_pronoun] lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a research chemist. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chief engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert in all things fiddly and complex. [PAWN_pronoun] relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. [PAWN_pronoun] and [PAWN_possessive] ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Civil engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known civil engineer. [PAWN_possessive] job involved designing and maintaining rock fortification structures. [PAWN_pronoun] did enough statistical analysis to keep [PAWN_possessive] mind sharp.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Coliseum fighter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Applying the knowledge that [PAWN_pronoun] gained from years around fighters, [PAWN_pronoun] became a successful gladiator in the coliseum that [PAWN_pronoun] once cleaned.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Colonial governor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Disillusioned by rampant government corruption, [PAWN_nameDef] ran for governor and won. However, the local gangs and their pet officials soon forced [PAWN_objective] out of power. [PAWN_pronoun] left the community to return to [PAWN_possessive] life as a marshal.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a combat engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't shooting at people, that is.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat medic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] home country entered a large-scale war, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted into the army as a combat medic. [PAWN_possessive] few years in the trenches trying to keep [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers alive gave [PAWN_objective] an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made [PAWN_objective] stoic and reserved.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat negotiator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] took [PAWN_possessive] skills to the stars. [PAWN_pronoun] chose to operate as a hired gun, working for various rebel organizations, enslaved groups, and merchant enclaves. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was negotiation in combat situations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Computer engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Bored of [PAWN_possessive] code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive." With [PAWN_possessive] spouse, [PAWN_nameDef] undertook a journey into the unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core world jeweler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] time and energy to [PAWN_possessive] passion: trinket crafting. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years perfecting [PAWN_possessive] art as a jeweler, then left [PAWN_possessive] home world to sell [PAWN_possessive] wares across the galaxy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corp researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research. Unable to adapt to the social politics of [PAWN_possessive] workplace, [PAWN_pronoun] buried [PAWN_objective]self in [PAWN_possessive] work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, [PAWN_pronoun] yearned to be left alone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Corporate builder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even as [PAWN_pronoun] stewed in [PAWN_possessive] own wasted potential, [PAWN_nameDef] found [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions. Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased [PAWN_possessive] remaining creative impulses.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cosmetic reject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Living on the streets, [PAWN_nameDef] submitted [PAWN_objective]self to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter. After some painful cosmetic modification, [PAWN_nameDef] barely resembles [PAWN_possessive] former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until [PAWN_pronoun] was rescued, [PAWN_nameDef] is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Craft shaper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] locked [PAWN_objective]self in [PAWN_possessive] studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking. Eventually, [PAWN_possessive] creations brought [PAWN_objective] the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal kingpin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered [PAWN_possessive] gift - people did what [PAWN_pronoun] said, when [PAWN_pronoun] said it. Taking advantage of this, [PAWN_pronoun] set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for [PAWN_objective]self in the criminal underworld. Having people do things for [PAWN_objective] taught [PAWN_objective] to avoid manual labor at all costs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Criminal surgeon
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Being near many injured fellow criminals, [PAWN_nameDef] took it upon [PAWN_objective]self to work on them. Although many people died, [PAWN_pronoun] did get better at using knives.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Discharged soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] prostituted [PAWN_objective]self to fund [PAWN_possessive] drug habits. As an escape, [PAWN_pronoun] joined the military and learned to fight. Too smart for the army, [PAWN_pronoun] questioned and often disagreed with [PAWN_possessive] superiors' decisions. This eventually led to [PAWN_possessive] dishonorable discharge and left [PAWN_objective] with a chip on [PAWN_possessive] shoulder.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drug lieutenant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. [PAWN_pronoun] had [PAWN_possessive] men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around. [PAWN_possessive] social skills kept [PAWN_objective] on top of the political game, and [PAWN_pronoun] always had servants to cook and clean.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced [PAWN_objective] to learn negotiation skills, and [PAWN_pronoun] made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Engineered pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] province was besieged by one of its neighbors, [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for a generic modification program that created pilots for the very fighter craft that [PAWN_pronoun] had helped develop. The modifications allowed [PAWN_objective] to pilot the ship, but also made [PAWN_objective] less able to focus on the people around [PAWN_objective]. By this time, people were calling [PAWN_objective] "Squirrel."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Exotic chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has always gone overboard when it comes to food. [PAWN_pronoun] is always seeking new and exotic ingredients. [PAWN_possessive] quest for ingredients has brought [PAWN_objective] into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Expert handyman
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a traveling engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in [PAWN_possessive] ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Explorer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. [PAWN_pronoun] hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen official
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an official for an autocratic government. When [PAWN_possessive] superiors demanded [PAWN_pronoun] participate in atrocities, [PAWN_nameDef] resigned and escape from [PAWN_possessive] homeworld with nothing but the clothes on [PAWN_possessive] back.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feline scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a renowned scientist in the field of felines. Wanting the best for [PAWN_possessive] animals and specializing in selective breeding, [PAWN_pronoun] set out on a journey to find the perfect breeding grounds for [PAWN_possessive] cats.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier marshal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the marshal of [PAWN_possessive] colony. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed [PAWN_possessive] family and left [PAWN_objective] for dead. After regaining [PAWN_possessive] health, [PAWN_nameDef] arrested the mayor. [PAWN_pronoun] left [PAWN_possessive] homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Galactic sightseer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the stars. [PAWN_pronoun] could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it. Seeing the wonders of the galaxy was where [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] calling. [PAWN_pronoun] loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. The wonders of the universe inspired [PAWN_objective] like nothing else could.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Game developer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an independent game developer. After an early success, [PAWN_nameDef]'s career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Genetic engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried out [PAWN_possessive] first genetic experiments on farm animals. [PAWN_pronoun] soon grew to become quite skilled in all forms of genetic engineering. A horrifying lab accident left [PAWN_objective] with a mortal fear of rodents.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Genetic scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After the war [PAWN_pronoun] joined a genetic engineering firm. [PAWN_pronoun] worked on enhancements for humans and livestock. [PAWN_possessive] experiences in inflicting and healing wounds were very beneficial to [PAWN_possessive] work, but [PAWN_pronoun] developed a black sense of humor. This made social gatherings awkward.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Government agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During [PAWN_possessive] training [PAWN_pronoun] was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills. Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don't bother [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] sees no reason to clean them up.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Graphic designer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s interest in artistic expression led [PAWN_objective] to become a designer. [PAWN_possessive] eye for detail made [PAWN_objective] a reasonably well-known artist on [PAWN_possessive] planet, though [PAWN_possessive] meticulousness often led [PAWN_objective] to spend too much time perfecting a single project.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hedge fund manager
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef]'s portfolio grew rapidly as [PAWN_pronoun] charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on [PAWN_possessive] head. As [PAWN_pronoun] travelled the stars [PAWN_pronoun] found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hired assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] made a name for [PAWN_objective]self and shifted [PAWN_possessive] business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Human trafficker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] lost what little moral sense [PAWN_pronoun] had left.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter of the king
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to protect [PAWN_possessive] colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife. Despite [PAWN_possessive] best efforts, [PAWN_possessive] kingdom was destroyed. [PAWN_nameDef] developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. [PAWN_pronoun] was named for the place they found [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Information broker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] caught a ship to the next star system and began a life of travel and learning, quickly collecting a massive bank of knowledge from people of all shapes and sizes. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to sell this knowledge for great profit, and became a powerful broker of information.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] came of age, [PAWN_pronoun] was given a sword blessed by a high priest. [PAWN_possessive] determination and focus in battle established [PAWN_objective] as a knight. Throughout [PAWN_possessive] time, [PAWN_possessive] stories were recounted in art and folklore. Out of humility, [PAWN_pronoun] never told the stories [PAWN_objective]self.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lazy programmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] independently developed software that had a competitive edge against local urbworld corporations. [PAWN_possessive] legally questionable methods lead to a growing number in unsolved claims of intellectual property theft.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lone traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping [PAWN_possessive] homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty. [PAWN_pronoun] joined resistance groups and applied the skills [PAWN_pronoun] cultivated on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] often warned of the nuclear horror [PAWN_pronoun] saw as a child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mech war veteran
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since [PAWN_pronoun] was old enough to enlist. [PAWN_pronoun] has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than [PAWN_pronoun] cares to recall. These experiences left [PAWN_objective] hardened, both mentally and physically.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanics engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved solving problems and, with [PAWN_possessive] steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes. Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to pick and choose [PAWN_possessive] corporate clients. [PAWN_pronoun] made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medic soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in [PAWN_possessive] planetary army as a frontline medic. [PAWN_pronoun] soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them. [PAWN_pronoun] left the military and [PAWN_possessive] homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those [PAWN_pronoun] came across.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted as a doctor on a passing science vessel. Roaming the stars with a large crew of xenohumans and transbirds, [PAWN_pronoun] did genetic research on encountered species. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a deep friendship with one transbird but was forced to leave the ship when the captain dismissed all non-avians.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought for king and country on the battlefield, where [PAWN_pronoun] further honed [PAWN_possessive] skill with swords. [PAWN_possessive] greatest glory was leading a charge into an enemy courtroom and capturing the king at sword point.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mental patient
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum. [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually released, but [PAWN_pronoun] retained [PAWN_possessive] emotional distance, [PAWN_possessive] curiosity about human anatomy, and [PAWN_possessive] namesake manic giggling.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following in [PAWN_possessive] family's footsteps, [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier for hire. [PAWN_pronoun] is a naturally gifted sharpshooter. However, [PAWN_possessive] real passion is in perfecting a new recipe or dissecting a new gadget.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Alone, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to rebuild [PAWN_possessive] father's life's work. [PAWN_pronoun] challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo. [PAWN_possessive] men mutinied. [PAWN_pronoun] was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary pilot
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] convinced [PAWN_possessive] squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in. [PAWN_possessive] men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] teenage years as a mercenary, being hired to kill and maim others. [PAWN_pronoun] was tall, menacing, and frightening. [PAWN_pronoun] could instill fear into the heart of anyone who crossed [PAWN_objective], and kill anyone [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a lack of respect for life. [PAWN_pronoun] proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where [PAWN_pronoun] developed skills using guns and survival techniques. [PAWN_nameDef] did dirty work where [PAWN_pronoun] found it, and traveled to many worlds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Microbiologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A plague struck [PAWN_nameDef]'s native urbworld. [PAWN_nameDef] and other researchers revealed that the illness was a bioweapon, but the people turned on them, blaming them for the sickness. [PAWN_nameDef] barely escaped [PAWN_possessive] homeworld as it fell into chaos.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an engineer for a colonial military. [PAWN_pronoun] got to play with weapons, murder-drones, and other "fun" stuff. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in repairing and modifying mechanoids' tools. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] tested them [PAWN_objective]self.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military gunsmith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Inspired by a particularly evocative piece of propaganda, [PAWN_nameDef] signed up for the military in hopes of finding glory. To [PAWN_possessive] dismay, however, [PAWN_possessive] aptitude tests put [PAWN_objective] in the machine shop instead of on the front lines. Later, when [PAWN_pronoun] saw the rows of body bags returning home, [PAWN_pronoun] realized how lucky [PAWN_pronoun] was.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military inventor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef], in a final act of rebellion, left [PAWN_possessive] father's lab and joined the local Imperial military. [PAWN_pronoun] used [PAWN_possessive] laboratory skills to design machines of war. At this [PAWN_pronoun] was one of the best on [PAWN_possessive] planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mindwiped assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The corporation took and remade [PAWN_nameDef]. They trained [PAWN_objective] into an tool of destruction and subversion. [PAWN_pronoun] took to [PAWN_possessive] new life, finding satisfaction in the jobs they sent [PAWN_objective] on. When [PAWN_pronoun] learned that they planned on disposing of [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_nameDef] turned on [PAWN_possessive] masters, killing several and fleeing the planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Minister
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep [PAWN_possessive] citizens content. [PAWN_pronoun] had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though [PAWN_pronoun] never forgot how to do hard work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Missionary
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to devote [PAWN_possessive] life to religious service. [PAWN_pronoun] made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mob enforcer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After being "saved" from [PAWN_possessive] home world by a slaver ship, [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to an urbworld crime lord, where [PAWN_pronoun] was used as an enforcer. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ninja assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed stiletto-precise assassinations for an interplanetary conglomerate. [PAWN_pronoun] was assigned the most complex missions involving disguise, deception, subterfuge, and efficient violence. A nasty incident with a potted plant and an assassination gone wrong left [PAWN_objective] with an aversion to plant life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orbital reservist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted and trained. [PAWN_pronoun] was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Osteologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating university at the top of [PAWN_possessive] class, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly became a well-known and athletic college professor. With [PAWN_possessive] new found fame and fitness came a sudden reluctance to preform menial labor - such tasks are better left to graduate students.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Overwatch sniper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't know why [PAWN_pronoun] joined the military, but [PAWN_pronoun] stayed to protect [PAWN_possessive] fellow soldiers. Army life broke [PAWN_objective] down and built [PAWN_objective] back up. It taught [PAWN_objective] marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Paramilitary agent
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After scraping by on assorted shady jobs, [PAWN_nameDef] joined with a large paramilitary group to fight a war on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_possessive] role was infiltration and intelligence gathering

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Planetary diplomat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion and profession was interplanetary politics. [PAWN_pronoun] was a master of social manipulation and negotiation and devoted [PAWN_objective]self to working towards peace, compromise and mutual benefit.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Poison gardener
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent almost all [PAWN_possessive] time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society. In that time [PAWN_pronoun] learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Political assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] realized that [PAWN_possessive] true calling was in physical solutions to diplomatic problems. [PAWN_pronoun] sought training from the assassins guild on Ceti V. [PAWN_pronoun] was a quick study at the arts of subterfuge and death. [PAWN_pronoun] soon earned the guild rank of Deathjack.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed and did interviews constantly. [PAWN_pronoun] refined [PAWN_possessive] skills in dancing and singing, and became a master of social presentation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ranger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone, deep in a forest. [PAWN_pronoun] protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] own material needs without outside help.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Reporter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years as an investigative reporter. [PAWN_pronoun] was notorious for making chaotic reports from exotic locations. Although seen as a lightweight by [PAWN_possessive] critics, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to break several high-profile stories after lengthy investigations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Roboticist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of [PAWN_nameDef]'s ocean planet. [PAWN_pronoun] created robots to replace them. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] collected a small crew of robots to do [PAWN_possessive] bidding. [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rocket engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] won a grant to a top school and earned a degree in rocket engineering. After several years working for a space mining company [PAWN_pronoun] left to travel and see the universe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rugby player
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After years of addiction to virtual reality games, [PAWN_nameDef] was saved when the doctors unplugged [PAWN_objective]. Unfortunately, they unplugged [PAWN_objective] during a match of Rugby Rampage 4. The mental backlash merged [PAWN_possessive] real identity and [PAWN_possessive] virtual identity, leaving [PAWN_objective] with the personality and skills of a rugby player.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sanitation captain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After graduating officer training school, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. [PAWN_pronoun] served there for a year before [PAWN_possessive] "gallant" actions saw [PAWN_objective] reassigned to the maintenance corps. It was with the maintenance corps [PAWN_pronoun] was dubbed Table on account of [PAWN_possessive] legs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Serial murderer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] started to enjoy killing people, so [PAWN_pronoun] did more often and perfected [PAWN_possessive] methods. [PAWN_pronoun] lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed making artworks of [PAWN_possessive] victims, and was known for leaving [PAWN_possessive] signature on the bodies of those [PAWN_pronoun] killed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Slave chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a gifted pharmaceutical scientist, but was captured by slavers. [PAWN_pronoun] was sold to a warlord and forced to create drugs to test on other slaves. This left [PAWN_objective] with deep and troubling questions on the ethics of scientific research and medicine.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Smuggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a contract pilot, [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught. [PAWN_pronoun] eventually saved up enough to buy [PAWN_possessive] own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing [PAWN_possessive] goods in person.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked [PAWN_possessive] home and killed [PAWN_possessive] people, [PAWN_pronoun] was the last survivor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space humanitarian
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After seeing the rampant poverty common on overcrowded urban worlds, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to dedicate [PAWN_possessive] life to helping the less fortunate. This crusade taught [PAWN_objective] how to care for the sick and the hungry.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Now a proficient hunter and marksman, [PAWN_nameDef] yearned for more. [PAWN_pronoun] took leave from [PAWN_possessive] birth world, traveling the great expanse in search of exotic game.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited into the security forces of an off-planet corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] defended their ships against pirates and engaged in private space warfare contracts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space marine
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] joined a squad of space marines known for their brutal efficiency at killing. [PAWN_possessive] last name and [PAWN_possessive] lack of emotion during combat inspired [PAWN_possessive] nickname: Grim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space navy doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending [PAWN_possessive] homeworld. [PAWN_pronoun] learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space researcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] inherited [PAWN_possessive] parents' ship and carried on their research. [PAWN_possessive] childhood experiences with diverse cultures allowed [PAWN_objective] to preserve [PAWN_possessive] caring nature despite spending most of [PAWN_possessive] life isolated in space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space station cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The space station [PAWN_nameDef] came from was far from any populated planets, and was in itself understaffed. For this reason, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to learn how to cook in order to keep the crew alive. While [PAWN_pronoun] appreciated this learning opportunity, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't appreciate the criticism which came with it, and has had self-esteem issues ever since.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space technician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] finally managed to flee [PAWN_possessive] criminal life by getting a maintenance job on a nearby space station. [PAWN_pronoun] performed multiple repairing and building operations. [PAWN_pronoun] also used to participate in basic research activities and often defused co-workers' arguments. [PAWN_pronoun] never liked doing art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but [PAWN_pronoun] never got used to cleaning the dishes.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship salesperson
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tried [PAWN_possessive] hand at various jobs, including building space rabbit cages and working at a mutant wheat research project. Finally, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_possessive] true calling as a spacecraft salesperson. Specializing in recreational spacecraft, [PAWN_possessive] smooth talk and charming nature served [PAWN_objective] well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Special forces
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Give me a reason to kill - a good reason! [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that [PAWN_pronoun] entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] never imagined [PAWN_objective]self a lone hero, but [PAWN_pronoun] played [PAWN_possessive] part in the group well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spiceminer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made [PAWN_possessive] mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen'The. Little did [PAWN_pronoun] know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change [PAWN_possessive] life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by [PAWN_possessive] government in infiltration and espionage. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to keep a cool head and to talk [PAWN_possessive] way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, [PAWN_pronoun] was capable of more violent direct action.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stalwart farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] father's hunting rifle. [PAWN_pronoun] also mastered how to construct fences to keep livestock in and the local wildlife out. [PAWN_nameDef] tried to paint a picture of [PAWN_possessive] home and learned [PAWN_pronoun] can only draw scribbles and ducks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stalwart farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend [PAWN_objective]self with [PAWN_possessive] father's rifle. [PAWN_pronoun] also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out. [PAWN_pronoun] once tried to paint a picture of [PAWN_possessive] home, but discovered that [PAWN_pronoun] could only draw scribbles and ducks.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Star knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abducted from [PAWN_possessive] medieval homeworld, [PAWN_nameDef] later escaped [PAWN_possessive] captors via an impressive display of swordsmanship. For a moment, as [PAWN_pronoun] drifted in the escape pod, [PAWN_possessive] childhood dream of becoming a knight among the stars felt so real. Then [PAWN_pronoun] crash-landed.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starship doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor on a starship. [PAWN_pronoun] was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of [PAWN_possessive] own. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Station security
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There [PAWN_pronoun] prevented illegal human trafficking. Once, fire broke out on the station, and [PAWN_pronoun] saved many from the flames. Since then, [PAWN_pronoun] has avoided fires.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stiletto assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Because of [PAWN_possessive] skills, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a sense of superiority. In time, [PAWN_pronoun] lost [PAWN_possessive] sense of empathy. [PAWN_pronoun] often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person. After realizing [PAWN_possessive] talents, [PAWN_pronoun] became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Storyteller
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled [PAWN_possessive] world recounting the legends that [PAWN_pronoun] had studied. Obsessed with the legends of [PAWN_possessive] people, [PAWN_nameDef] seeks someone who can help [PAWN_objective] grow scales on [PAWN_possessive] skin, so [PAWN_pronoun] too can be as the ancients were.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Technology doctor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation. [PAWN_pronoun] loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Kidnapped as a teenager, [PAWN_nameDef] was an unwilling test subject in experimental gene therapies for six years. Labs and scientists scare [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tests went from geometry to quantum physics, and [PAWN_pronoun] could run the grand gauntlet without a scratch. One day, Mother said that [PAWN_possessive] final test lay beyond the red door, and that even if [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't hear her voice, Mother would always be there.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Undertaker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While [PAWN_pronoun] never shied away from physical confrontation, [PAWN_pronoun] prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Unstable butcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] began hearing voices. The animals were talking to [PAWN_objective], insulting [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] came to hate them, and eventually killed [PAWN_possessive] furry former friends. [PAWN_pronoun] started selling the meat just to get human interaction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld politician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: It's no secret that the Companies own much of the urbworlds, but someone has to take the bribes. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such figurehead. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to manipulate the hopes and dreams of the people while living comfortably in a penthouse.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld sergeant
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for all things militaristic kept with [PAWN_objective] all the way to adulthood. After enrolling as a local police officer, [PAWN_pronoun] was soon promoted to sergeant.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld sex slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold into sexual slavery. Having been designed to be inhumanly attractive and too weak to rebel against [PAWN_possessive] masters, [PAWN_pronoun] was passed between dozens of owners and knew nothing of freedom.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Versatile worker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spending [PAWN_possessive] later teenage years in a colony of settlers, [PAWN_pronoun] offered what little skills [PAWN_pronoun] had to anyone who would take [PAWN_objective]. Being a quick learner, [PAWN_pronoun] honed many of [PAWN_possessive] skills and, apart from [PAWN_possessive] crippling inability to understand fire, is now a fully functioning adult.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. [PAWN_pronoun] endured the glory and horrors of war. Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, [PAWN_nameDef] "retired" to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days polishing [PAWN_possessive] war medals, knowing [PAWN_pronoun] had done [PAWN_possessive] bloodline proud.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Villain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After rising to the top of [PAWN_possessive] criminal band, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. [PAWN_pronoun] excelled at bending others to [PAWN_possessive] will.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with [PAWN_possessive] practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed [PAWN_objective] most.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: War chief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal gang leader on a neolithic planet. For [PAWN_objective], the battlefield is a game, and there is nothing more fun than the fires of war.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland ruffian
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Survival was a day-to-day struggle. Food usually consisted of half-decomposed animals, and water had to be condensed from the air. To survive, [PAWN_nameDef] became resourceful. A surveyor from the Ordo Historia happened across [PAWN_nameDef]'s world and rescued [PAWN_objective].

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: White-hat hacker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From [PAWN_possessive] computer, [PAWN_nameDef] helped rid the online world of bad people.
